resources.string:
"""The goal of the game is to uncover the secret number with a minimal number of attempts (try with less than ten).
The game indicates the number of matches in your proposition.

- All digits in the secret number are different.
- If your guess has matching digits on the exact places, they are Bulls img1
- If you have digits from the secret number, but not on the right places, they are Cows img2"""
Your guess must contain unique numbers
